attributes.comment:
The cost to adopt is very expensive. There are many "little" charges here and
there that add quickly to the 10's of thousands of dollars. Many parents are also
having to submit the I600 2 times based on the current expiration time period and
having to be refingerprinted. So the increase is HUGE when added to the current
costs and then DOUBLED. I fear that many children will not be brought home to
their family because of this. this money is better invested in their educational
future then on paperwork.
Please reconsider this increase and consider increasing the time for these docs
so they don't have to be redone. This will save us ALL time and money.
Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Debra Paliani
